mapping.update: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `seq` int(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, INDEX `index_seq`(`seq`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
